title: Clinical Trial Matching Output
description: Output schema for clinical trial matching results

matches.description: Ranked list of matched clinical trials

location_summary.description: Summary of trial locations (e.g., 'Boston, MA; New York, NY')

why_matched.description: Short explanation of why this trial was matched

eligibility_highlights.description: Key eligibility criteria highlights relevant to the patient

match_score.description: Overall match score (0-100, higher is better)

distance_miles.description: Approximate distance in miles to nearest trial location (null if geography not provided or location unknown)

query_debug_info.description: Optional debugging information about how queries were derived

total_candidates.description: Total number of candidate trials found before filtering

filtered_count.description: Number of trials after eligibility filtering

geography_used.description: Whether geography was used for proximity ranking
